## ICallControl.mute() method

Mutes or unmutes the microphone of the Jabra device.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mute(shouldMute: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  shouldMute | boolean | <code>true</code> to mute the device, <code>false</code> to unmute it. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Exceptions

If a call lock was not acquired prior to execution. See [ICallControl.takeCallLock()](./jabra-js.icallcontrol.takecalllock.md) for more details.

## Remarks

Should only be used during a call.
